response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, estimated at $1,000,000. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you have the chance to secure this masterpiece at a remarkable discount. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this unique acquisition.", "product_price": 950000}
